tool_description: Processes and validates patient allergy information including drug allergies, food allergies, environmental allergies, and reaction severity for clinical safety.

reaction_types.description: Type of reaction for each allergy

severity_levels.description: Severity of each allergic reaction (mild, moderate, severe)

error_messages: Invalid patient ID: Patient must be registered in the system.
Invalid severity level: Severity must be one of [mild, moderate, severe].
Unrecognized allergen: Some allergens are not found in the standard allergy database.
Array length mismatch: If providing reaction_types or severity_levels, they must match the total number of allergens.
Missing critical information: Severe allergies require reaction type specification.
usage: Provide patient ID and allergy information across categories. Include reaction types and severity levels for comprehensive allergy documentation.

critical_allergies.description: List of severe or life-threatening allergies

allergy_summary.description: Formatted summary of patient's allergy profile

alert_level.description: Overall allergy alert level (none, standard, high, critical)
